text: Nikolaos Ioannidis (born 28 May 1960) is a Greek rower. He competed in the men's coxless pair event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Greek male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Greece Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Nikolaos Ioannidis (rower)
